languages.text:
Посты — ваша "обойма" способностей и атак для космического боя.
Способности постов вы можете получать, повышая уровень вашего корабля.
На один пост вы можете назначить две обычные способности и одну особую.
Каждый раунд вы можете использовать одну способность каждого поста.
Время восстановления способностей каждый раз случайное и может составлять до 3 ходов.
Чтобы использовать способность поста, активируйте панель постов корабля с помощью {console_bind|Func02}, выберите способность, которую хотите использовать, и нажмите {console_bind|Confirm}, чтобы применить способность или выбрать цель.

traits.locale_text:
Посты — ваша "обойма" способностей и атак для космического боя.
Способности для постов вы можете получать, прокачивая ваш корабль.
На один пост вы можете назначить 2 обычных способности и 1 Суперспособность.
Каждый раунд вы можете использовать одну способность каждого поста.
Кулдаун способностей каждый раз случайный, может быть до 3х ходов.
Чтобы использовать способность поста активируйте панель постов корабля с помощью {console_bind | Func02}, выберите способность, которую хотите использовать и нажмите {console_bind | Confirm} чтобы применить способность или выбрать цель.

languages.text:
Think of posts as your "ammo clip" of abilities and attacks in space battles.
{g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}Post{/g} abilities are unlocked as you level up your ship.
You can assign up to two basic abilities and one {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}ultimate ability{/g} to every post.
Each round, you can use only one ability from each post.
The cooldown times of abilities are determined randomly after each use and can take up to 3 rounds.
To use a post's ability, activate the posts panel using {console_bind|Func02}, select the ability you wish to use, and press {console_bind|Confirm} to use the ability or choose a target.
languages.original_text:
Посты — ваша "обойма" способностей и атак для космического боя.
Способности постов вы можете получать, повышая уровень вашего корабля.
На один пост вы можете назначить две обычные способности и одну особую.
Каждый раунд вы можете использовать одну способность каждого поста.
Время восстановления способностей каждый раз случайное и может составлять до 3 ходов.
Чтобы использовать способность поста, активируйте панель постов корабля с помощью {console_bind|Func02}, выберите способность, которую хотите использовать, и нажмите {console_bind|Confirm}, чтобы применить способность или выбрать цель.

traits.locale_text:
Think of posts as your "ammo clip" of abilities and attacks in space battles.
Post abilities are unlocked as you level up your ship.
You can assign up to two basic abilities and one ultimate ability to one post.
Each round, you can use only one ability from each post.
The cooldown times of abilities are determined randomly after each use and can take up to 3 rounds.
To use a post's ability, activate the posts panel using {console_bind|Func02}, select the ability you wish to use, and press {console_bind|Confirm} to use the ability or choose a target.

Think of posts as your "ammo clip" of abilities and attacks in space battles.
Post abilities are unlocked as you level up your ship.
You can assign up to two basic abilities and one ultimate ability to every post.
Each round, you can use only one ability from each post.
The cooldown times of abilities are determined randomly after each use and can take up to 3 rounds.
To use a post's ability, activate the posts panel using {console_bind|Func02}, select the ability you wish to use, and press {console_bind|Confirm} to use the ability or choose a target.

Think of posts as your "ammo clip" of abilities and attacks in space battles.
{g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}Post{/g} abilities are unlocked as you level up your ship.
You can assign up to two basic abilities and one {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}ultimate ability{/g} to every post.
Each round, you can use only one ability from each post.
The cooldown times of abilities are determined randomly after each use and can take up to 3 rounds.
To use a post's ability, activate the posts panel using {console_bind|Func02}, select the ability you wish to use, and press {console_bind|Confirm} to use the ability or choose a target.

Think of posts as your "ammo clip" of abilities and attacks in space battles.
{g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}Post{/g} abilities are unlocked as you level up your ship.
You can assign up to two basic abilities and one {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}ultimate ability{/g} to every post.
Each round, you can use only one ability from each post.
The cooldown times of abilities are determined randomly after each use and can take up to 3 rounds.
To use a post's ability, activate the posts panel using {console_bind|Func02}, select the ability you wish to use, and press {console_bind|Confirm} to use the ability or choose a target.

languages.text:
Los puestos son, para las capacidades y los ataques en batallas espaciales, como los «cargadores» de un arma.
Las capacidades de {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}puesto{/g} se desbloquean según vaya subiendo de nivel tu nave.
Puedes asignar hasta dos capacidades básicas y una {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}definitiva{/g} a cada puesto.
En cada asalto solo puedes usar una capacidad de cada puesto.
El tiempo de recuperación de las capacidades se determina aleatoriamente tras cada uso y puede dilatarse hasta los 3 asaltos.
Para usar la capacidad de un puesto, activa el panel de puestos con {console_bind|Func02}, selecciona la capacidad que quieras usar y pulsa {console_bind|Confirm} para usarla o elegir un objetivo.
languages.original_text:
Think of posts as your "ammo clip" of abilities and attacks in space battles.
{g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}Post{/g} abilities are unlocked as you level up your ship.
You can assign up to two basic abilities and one {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}ultimate ability{/g} to every post.
Each round, you can use only one ability from each post.
The cooldown times of abilities are determined randomly after each use and can take up to 3 rounds.
To use a post's ability, activate the posts panel using {console_bind|Func02}, select the ability you wish to use, and press {console_bind|Confirm} to use the ability or choose a target.

traits.locale_text:
Los puestos son, para las {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} y los ataques en batallas espaciales, como los peines de munición para un fusil.
Las capacidades de {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}puesto{/g} se desbloquean según vaya {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}subiendo de nivel{/g} tu nave.
Puedes asignar hasta dos capacidades básicas y una definitiva a cada puesto.
En cada {g|Encyclopedia:Round}ronda{/g} solo puedes usar una capacidad de cada puesto.
El {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}tiempo de recuperación{/g} de las capacidades se determina aleatoriamente tras cada uso y puede dilatarse hasta las 3 rondas.
Para usar la capacidad de un puesto, activa el panel de puestos con {console_bind|Func02}, selecciona la capacidad que quieras usar y pulsa {console_bind|Confirm} para usarla o elegir un objetivo.

languages.text:
役職は宇宙戦におけるアビリティや攻撃の「弾薬庫」だと考えよう。
{g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}役職{/g}アビリティは船のレベルアップに応じてアンロックされる。
各役職には最大2つの基本アビリティと1つの{g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}究極アビリティ{/g}を割り当てることができる。
各ラウンドで使用できるアビリティは各役職から1つのみだ。
アビリティのクールダウン時間は使用後にランダムで決定され、最大で3ラウンドかかる。
役職のアビリティを使用するには、{console_bind|Func02}を使って役職パネルを起動し、使用したいアビリティを選択して{console_bind|Confirm}を押してアビリティを使用するか、ターゲットを選択しよう。
languages.original_text:
Think of posts as your "ammo clip" of abilities and attacks in space battles.
{g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}Post{/g} abilities are unlocked as you level up your ship.
You can assign up to two basic abilities and one {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}ultimate ability{/g} to every post.
Each round, you can use only one ability from each post.
The cooldown times of abilities are determined randomly after each use and can take up to 3 rounds.
To use a post's ability, activate the posts panel using {console_bind|Func02}, select the ability you wish to use, and press {console_bind|Confirm} to use the ability or choose a target.

traits.locale_text:
ポストは、宇宙戦闘における{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}と攻撃の挿弾子、つまりクリップである。
船を{g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}レベルアップ{/g}すると、{g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}ポスト{/g}アビリティがロック解除される。
各ポストには基本アビリティを最大ふたつ、究極アビリティをひとつ割り当てることができる。
{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}ごとに、各ポストからアビリティをひとつだけ使用できる。
アビリティの{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}クールダウン{/g}時間は使用ごとにランダムに決定され、最大で3ラウンドかかる。
ポストアビリティを使うには、{console_bind|Func02}でポストパネルを起動し、使用したいアビリティを選び、{console_bind|Confirm}を押してアビリティを使うか、ターゲットを選ぶ。

languages.text:
在太空战斗中，您可以将不同{g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}职位{/g}视为能力与攻击方式的“弹匣”。
随着您的舰船等级提升，新的职位能力也会随之解锁。
每个职位最多可以分配两个基础能力与一个{g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}终极能力{/g}。
每轮中，每个职位只能使用一种能力。
使用完能力之后，该能力的冷却时间会随机决定，最长可能会长达三轮。
若想使用某个职位的能力，先使用{console_bind|Func02}激活职位面板，之后按下{console_bind|Confirm}来使用能力或选择目标。
languages.original_text:
Think of posts as your "ammo clip" of abilities and attacks in space battles.
{g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}Post{/g} abilities are unlocked as you level up your ship.
You can assign up to two basic abilities and one {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}ultimate ability{/g} to every post.
Each round, you can use only one ability from each post.
The cooldown times of abilities are determined randomly after each use and can take up to 3 rounds.
To use a post's ability, activate the posts panel using {console_bind|Func02}, select the ability you wish to use, and press {console_bind|Confirm} to use the ability or choose a target.

traits.locale_text:
在太空战斗中，您可以将不同职位视为{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}与攻击方式的“弹匣”。
随着您的舰船{g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}等级提升{/g}，新的{g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}职位{/g}能力也会随之解锁。
每个职位最多可以分配两个基础能力与一个终极能力。
每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中，每个职位只能使用一种能力。
使用完能力之后，该能力的{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却时间{/g}会随机决定，最长可能会长达三轮。
若想使用某个职位的能力，先使用{console_bind|Func02}激活职位面板，之后按下{console_bind|Confirm}来使用能力或选择目标。

languages.text:
Betrachte Posten als dein "Munitionsmagazin" für Fähigkeiten und Angriffe in Weltraumkämpfen.
Die {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}Posten{/g}-Fähigkeiten werden freigeschaltet, wenn du dein Schiff hochstufst.
Du kannst jedem Posten bis zu zwei Grundfähigkeiten und eine {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}ultimative Fähigkeit{/g} zuweisen.
Pro Runde kannst du nur eine Fähigkeit jedes Postens benutzen.
Die Abklingzeit der Fähigkeiten wird nach jedem Einsatz zufällig bestimmt und kann bis zu 3 Runden dauern.
Um die Fähigkeit eines Postens zu benutzen, aktiviere das Posten-Panel mit {console_bind|Func02}, wähle die gewünschte Fähigkeit aus und drücke {console_bind|Confirm}, um die Fähigkeit zu benutzen oder ein Ziel auszuwählen.
languages.original_text:
Think of posts as your "ammo clip" of abilities and attacks in space battles.
{g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}Post{/g} abilities are unlocked as you level up your ship.
You can assign up to two basic abilities and one {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}ultimate ability{/g} to every post.
Each round, you can use only one ability from each post.
The cooldown times of abilities are determined randomly after each use and can take up to 3 rounds.
To use a post's ability, activate the posts panel using {console_bind|Func02}, select the ability you wish to use, and press {console_bind|Confirm} to use the ability or choose a target.

traits.locale_text:
Betrachte Posten als dein „Munitionsmagazin“ für {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} und Angriffe in Weltraumkämpfen.
Die {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}Posten{/g}-Fähigkeiten werden freigeschaltet, wenn du dein Schiff {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}hochstufst{/g}.
Du kannst jedem Posten bis zu zwei Grundfähigkeiten und eine ultimative Fähigkeit zuweisen.
Pro {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} kannst du nur eine Fähigkeit jedes Postens benutzen.
Die {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g} der Fähigkeiten wird nach jedem Einsatz zufällig bestimmt und kann bis zu 3 Runden dauern.
Um die Fähigkeit eines Postens zu benutzen, aktiviere das Posten-Panel mit {console_bind|Func02}, wähle die gewünschte Fähigkeit aus und drücke {console_bind|Confirm}, um die Fähigkeit zu benutzen oder ein Ziel auszuwählen.

languages.text:
Les postes font office de « chargeur de munitions » de capacités et d'attaques lors des combats spatiaux.
Les capacités des {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}postes{/g} se débloquent au fur et à mesure que vous faites évoluer votre vaisseau.
Vous pouvez attribuer jusqu'à deux capacités de base et une {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}capacité ultime{/g} à chaque poste.
À chaque round, vous ne pouvez utiliser qu'une seule capacité par poste.
Le temps de recharge des capacités est déterminé aléatoirement après chaque utilisation et peut prendre jusqu'à 3 rounds.
Pour utiliser la capacité d'un poste, activez le panneau des postes avec {console_bind|Func02}, sélectionnez la capacité souhaitée et appuyez sur {console_bind|Confirm} pour utiliser la capacité ou choisir une cible.
languages.original_text:
Think of posts as your "ammo clip" of abilities and attacks in space battles.
{g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}Post{/g} abilities are unlocked as you level up your ship.
You can assign up to two basic abilities and one {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}ultimate ability{/g} to every post.
Each round, you can use only one ability from each post.
The cooldown times of abilities are determined randomly after each use and can take up to 3 rounds.
To use a post's ability, activate the posts panel using {console_bind|Func02}, select the ability you wish to use, and press {console_bind|Confirm} to use the ability or choose a target.

traits.locale_text:
Les postes font office de « chargeur de munitions » de {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} et d'attaques lors des combats spatiaux.
Les capacités des {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}postes{/g} se débloquent au fur et à mesure que vous faites {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}évoluer{/g} votre vaisseau.
Vous pouvez attribuer jusqu'à deux capacités de base et une capacité ultime à chaque poste.
À chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, vous ne pouvez utiliser qu'une seule capacité par poste.
Le délai de {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}récupération{/g} des capacités est déterminé aléatoirement après chaque utilisation et peut prendre jusqu'à trois rounds.
Pour utiliser la capacité d'un poste, activez le panneau des postes à l’aide de {console_bind|Func02}, sélectionnez la capacité souhaitée et appuyez sur {console_bind|Confirm} pour utiliser la capacité ou choisir une cible.

languages.text:
Mevkileri uzay çatışmalarındaki kabiliyet ve saldırıların "cephane şarjörü" olarak düşünebilirsin.
Gemine seviye kazandırdıkça {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}mevki{/g} kabiliyetleri açılır.
Her bir mevkiye en fazla iki temel kabiliyet ve bir de {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}üstün kabiliyet{/g} atayabilirsin.
Bir raunt içinde her bir mevkiden yalnızca bir kabiliyet kullanabilirsin.
Kabiliyetlerin her bir kullanımından sonraki dolum süresi rastgele belirlenir ve en fazla 3 raunt sürebilir.
Bir mevkinin kabiliyetini kullanmak için {console_bind|Func02} ile mevki panelini etkinleştir, kabiliyeti seç ve {console_bind|Confirm} düğmesine basarak kabiliyeti kullan veya bir hedef seç.
